name: Count the number of occurrences of each character in the string

0.name: What will be output to the console after running the code below?
{A: true, P: true, S: true, V: true}

1.name: [A: true, P: true, S: true, V: true].
What will be the result of executing the code below?
{i: true, m: true, n: true, u: true}

2.name: Is the code below case sensitive and what is the result of executing the code?

0.name: The search is case sensitive, the result will be {a: 0, i: 0, m: 0, u: 0, x: 0}

1.name: The search is case insensitive, the result will be {a: 1, i: 1, m: 3, u: 1, x: 1}

2.name: The search is case sensitive, the result will be {A: 1, I: 1, M: 2, m: 1, U: 1, X: 1}

3.name: The search is case insensitive, the result will be {a: 1, i: 1, m: 1, u: 1, x: 1}
Will the spaces and question mark in the code below be taken into account and what will be output to the console?

0.name: Only letters are considered, the result will be {a: 1, e: 1, h: 1, o: 2, r: 1, u: 1, w: 1, y: 1}

1.name: All characters are considered, the result will be {" ": 2, ?: 1, a: 1, e: 1, h: 1, o: 2, r: 1, u: 1, w: 1, y: 1}

2.name: Only letters and characters are considered, the result will be {?: 1, a: 1, e: 1, h: 1, o: 2, r: 1, u: 1, w: 1, y: 1}

3.name: Only letters and spaces are considered, the result will be {" ": 2, a: 1, e: 1, h: 1, o: 2, r: 1, u: 1, w: 1, y: 1}

4.name: What does the Object.keys() method do?

0.name: Translates the keys of an object into an array

1.name: Translates object values into an array

2.name: Translates the keys and values of an object into an array

3.name: Translates object keys, including the keys of nested objects, into an array

5.name: What will be the result of executing the code below?

6.name: What does the Object.values() method return?

0.name: The method returns an array of object values, including the values of nested objects

1.name: The method returns an array of keys and values of the object

2.name: The method returns an array of values of the object

3.name: The method returns an array of keys of the object

7.name: Select the correct version of the code result below

8.name: What does the Object.entries() method return?

0.name: Array of object properties, in the format [key, value]

1.name: Array of object properties, in the format [value, key]

2.name: An array of object keys, in the format [key, key, key, key, key]

3.name: Array of object values, in the format [value, value, value, value, value]
